DOC.detailed_description: Objective study : The aim study compare general anesthesia ( GA ) combine ( epidural spinal ) anesthesia ( CA ) laparoscopic cholecystectomy . General anesthesia gold standard laparoscopic cholecystectomy ( LC ) . The use combine anesthesia may offer several advantage general anesthesia . Material method : Fifty patient randomly assign either CA LC ( 25 patient ) GA LC ( 25 patient ) . All patient symptomatic gall stone disease polyp gall bladder . Intraoperative event relate combined anesthesia : abdominal discomfortable , shoulder pain , abdominal pain , nausea , anxiety , dermatomal level sensory blockade , respiratory depression . We compare two group ; shoulder pain , postoperative complication , pain score , duration operation time length hospital stay . Fifty patient select prospectively LC , low pressure ( 10 mm Hg ) pneumoperitoneum combine anesthesia general anesthesia . Spinal anaesthesia perform L1-L2 interspace use 2 ml 0.5 % ( 10 mg ) hyperbaric Bupivacaine mix 0.5ml ( 25 microgram ) Fentanyl . Epidural catheter insert L1- L2 interspace .
